desc: At New Gear Medical, we make antimicrobial medical equipment and supply bags and accessories for healthcare professionals that offer safety, compliance, convenience, and organization.

layout.text: SALE INTO SPRING with our new prices!

Anti-Microbial Protection - DURABLE AND STYLISH MEDICAL SUPPLY BAGS WITH ANTIMICROBIAL TREATED MATERIAL. New Gear Medical’s industry leading bags resist the growth of bacteria and microbes, providing infection control. Made of 1680D ballistic polyester and water-resistant antimicrobial material providing optimum organization. Easy to clean and lightweight. We’ve included a variety of storage compartments to hold and protect your medical devices, supplies, and a tablet or laptop. Contact us for distributor opportunities and our OEM capabilities, group and team orders.
